Dead by Daylight (Dbd) tem uma das maiores ideias de jogos de todos os tempos, reviver os antigos filmes de slasher como: Chainsaw massacrer, A Nightmare on Elm Street, Halloween em forma de jogo, 4 sobreviventes tendo de escapar de um assassino brutal e agressivo na qual tem o papel de fazer sacrificios a um deus/entidade daquele reino de dor e agonia, enquanto os sobreviventes precisam arrumar geradores para abrir os portões e fugir e se preocupar com a vida do parceiro a cada segundo...

Se vc comprar esse jogo sem saber quase nada dele, vc sente um medo maravilhoso, vc não sabe como as coisas funcionam, quem é o assassino, oq ele faz, quando que vc pode se esconder, quando pode salvar e etc... E esse medo se torna um poder prazeroso na mão do killer, vc se alto torna a ameaça ali, o monstro, aquele que deve ceifar cada vida que aparece na sua frente sem se preocupar com nada, um sentimento muito bom para começo de jogo

Mas pq eu estou dando uma nota negativa? Facil... O jogo perde facilmente sua essencia, sempre os mesmos truques, sempre os mesmos killers, raramente vc cai com sobreviventes que vão ajudar e se vc e o killer sempre vai ter 4 sobreviventes que vão te bullinar da pior maneira possivel, a essencia do terro se perde muito cedo e vc acaba esquecendo desse jogo, ele tem uma ideia maravilhosa mas é muito pouco executada, e em meu pc ele mão roda, sempre crasha dps de uma atualização que teve, nem ao menos da para se jogar uma, varios killers tem o mesmo poder apenas variando um pouco do outro, parece que perderam total criatividade sobre criar poder.

É triste eu ter de dar uma nota negativa a esse jogo, ele me divertiu bastante no começo, me fez querer ter vontade de jogar direito mas vc não é muito recompensado com isso, não é como um Lol ou Cs da vida que cada partida vai ter algo diferente, talvez vc crie amizade com alguém ou xingue alguém ate a 9 geração daquela pessoa, no dbd vc apenas tem frustação dps de um tempo, queria que a empresa olhasse mais para o proprio jogo inves de criar skins, spin-off e etc.

PELO AMOR DE DEUS, ALGUÉM MODIFICA O MEMENTO DO TRAPPER E DO WRAITH!
the devs could do a better job if they blindfolded a monkey and let it do their job for them. this game isnt like hockey, its shit

If you rage heavily and tend to break things when you do dont get this game, HOWEVER if you dont rage and enjoy a good challenge this game is pretty good with that. There are a lot of toxic people who play this game to watch out for but other than that the game is pretty fun. Try and play with friends 4 recommended but a few will do, if you end up playing with some randoms ( some randos are good Some are bad) you could be in for a good match or a horrible one. PLAY AT YOUR OWN RISK!!!! :) happy surviving or killing whichever tickles your fancy.

I can't believe what they did with this game. in 2017/2018 I played a lot of dbd. this game 4 years ago was rly good not gona lie. but now this game is just fucking shit everything that was cool has been removed. The balance of the game sucks. The constant addition of shit things and shit mechanics makes this game worse and worse every year. The rank system is totally busted adding emblems to add some winratio later and finally hiding the ranks of others. first rank literally means nothing once I had to sweat with a friend about 300 hours to reach the first rank today it's a matter of how much you just play this game because no matter how you play sooner or later you will reach it. I do not see the point in playing this game, because why if it is not fun and achieving the first rank literally does not give you anything. I have not seen a game that literally breaks everything to such an extent that you do not want to play this game. maybe if mathieu cote does killer gameplay again he'll see how shit this game is.
DBD the worst game I have played recently, even in the league of legends I wasn't so disappointed and I thought you can't spoil a game that much but I was wrong.

Ive owned the game since mid 2018, and since then there have been a lot of changes and reworks. What used to not be viable become viable and the tweaks of certain troublesome perks though those tweaks really didnt alleviate the issues just make new ones. I can say in some regards its changed while its fallen totally flat in others. BHVR has this attitude where they make changes based on what they think is best over the community who actually plays the game. of the unnecessary changes there are many, my top picks being the Hillbilly's overheat mechanic when the addons were the issue (these were changed entirely a few times since overheat was added) the hud rework, and the survivor animations being changed. The game peaked in 2019 imo and its only gone south from there, not to say most of the things they have dont arent good, personally I think what DBD used to be isnt what it is anymore. I wouldnt recommend the game in its current state either until it improves or the devs actually use community input in their balancing decisions

鬼ごっこと隠れんぼ。ゲームの要素はシンプルだからとても面白くてハマっています。鯖やっているときのドキドキ感はたまらないですね。キラーは個別に能力を持っているけど、使いこなすのが難しそう。サバイバーやってるとき、後ろ見ながらのチェイスがまだ難しいです。ＰＳの時は簡単だったけどキーボードは慣れが必要。ほしいパークがそろう頃には上達しているといいのだが・・・。
